title: Google Photos tests new quick ‘chip’ toolbar for text-based images
content:
Google Photos appears to be testing a new chip toolbar UI to help speed up the process of using Lens and other image editing tools specifically with text-based images.

more…

The post Google Photos tests new quick ‘chip’ toolbar for text-based images appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google Photos is testing a new chips toolbar that offers up editing controls and the Google Lens shortcut for text-based images.
